title: ARTICLE 2.4.: EXCLUSIONS
sample_text:
2.4.1. 
Property Excluded
If at the time of loss or destruction of or damage to any item insured under 
the Policy, it is found that the Sum Insured is less than the New 
Replacement Value, then the amount recoverable by the Insured under 
this Policy shall be reduced by such proportion as the Sum Insured bears 
to the New Replacement Value.
